TopicTitle: Did you know that in former eastern block not broadcast Apollo 11 except one

Articles.Content:
Did you know that my country Poland is only country in former eastern block which made live broadcast of Apollo 11 lunar landing:D

In communist Poland not everyone could to afford own tv sets. My mom once told that with all family she watched Neil Armstrong at my aunt her sister private tv set (Poland was only country in communist block who broadcast Apollo 11 lunar landing for with your communist party first secretary Edward Gierek was scolded by Leonid Brezhnev, for spreading the American imperialist propaganda, but our First Secretary Gierek replied that Brezhnev regrets that hurt our fraternal Soviet Union, but he couldn't deprive citizens of Poland, such epochal events like landing on the moon, even if it made by Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹the U.S. imperialists)

As i talked about him with my parents, both my mother and how and late dad. They told me that many misses with the first secretary Gierek.

He built a lot of apartment blocks, inter alia, that where I live.

As i watched current affairs program in which many of our Polish politicians, even those with right-wing, speaks of him with affection, some time sarcastically added that he may have been a commie, but he was a good commie: D

Although he was forced to step down, in the early 80's due to the deteriorating economic situation of Polish, which in turn led to the creation of Solidarity, the rest probably all know: D

Gierek was blamed for everything because he created the national debt in the billions of dollars, borrowed money both within the Eastern Bloc and in the capitalist countries. The truth is that for the money he borrowed from other countries, a Polish expanded infrastructure and industry. Many of the factories nowadays mostly privatized works until today.

The Hungarian TV channel also broadcasted the first moon landing. My grandparents were watching it. After 1956 it was hard to keep high profile events like this beyond the border.
